entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 07:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -22.7°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm near Kamloops. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
